Overview Install API
Installation

Build the extension with performance flags enabled.

The project ships with LTO enabled by default and optional PGO tooling. Use editable installs for development or standard installs for release builds.

Quick Start
python -m pip install -e .

Editable install with local rebuilds.

Build Options

Optimized compilation

LTO (Link-Time Optimization)

Enabled by default. Disable if needed:

SORTEDCOLLECTIONS_LTO=0 python -m pip install -e .

PGO (Profile-Guided Optimization)

Two-phase build with training workload:

SORTEDCOLLECTIONS_PGO=1 SORTEDCOLLECTIONS_PGO_MODE=gen python -m pip install -e .
python scripts/pgo_train.py
SORTEDCOLLECTIONS_PGO=1 SORTEDCOLLECTIONS_PGO_MODE=use python -m pip install -e .

Sanity Check

Verification
pytest -q

All tests should pass before benchmarking.
